title: S13 Ep45: Tails from the Afterlife: Stories of Signs, Messages & Inspiration
itunes:title: Tails from the Afterlife: Stories of Signs, Messages & Inspiration
description:
Today on BEYOND the DARKNESS, Dave & Tim give the listeners a belly rub and scratch behind the ears with Tails from the Afterlife: Stories of Signs, Messages & Inspiration from your Animal Companions with guest Kristy Robinett

Kristy & Dave share stories and laughs about our furry friends, from stories of Sanctuary seeking Sloths, to College bound Turtles, Possessed Pigs, Murderous Cats & Guardian Angel Dogs

Get the book here: Amazon.com/Shop/darknessradio

Get Psychic Readings Here: Call 855-453-2000 or go to psychicsource.com. Use promo code DARKNESS for your special, limited time only, introductory rate!
